Uses of Class
com.autonomy.aci.client.transport.AciResponseInputStream

  • Packages that use AciResponseInputStream 
    Package Description
    com.autonomy.aci.client.services
    API classes and interfaces for ACI services.
    com.autonomy.aci.client.services.impl
    Core implementation of the AciService interface.
    com.autonomy.aci.client.transport
    API classes and interfaces for ACI transport.
    com.autonomy.aci.client.transport.gss
    Extensions to the core implementation to allow communication with ACI servers using GSS-API.
    com.autonomy.aci.client.transport.impl
    Core implementation of the AciHttpClient interface.

    • Uses of AciResponseInputStream in com.autonomy.aci.client.transport.impl

      Subclasses of AciResponseInputStream in com.autonomy.aci.client.transport.impl 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AciResponseInputStreamImpl
      This AciResponseInputStream implementation provides the ability to release a HttpClient connection when the stream has been read, even if the stream is being read by code that doesn't know where it's come from.
      class  DecryptingAciResponseInputStreamImpl
      This AciResponseInputStream implementation decrypts ACI responses from actions that have been sent with the EncryptResponse parameter set to true.
      Methods in com.autonomy.aci.client.transport.impl that return AciResponseInputStream 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AciResponseInputStream AciHttpClientImpl.executeAction(AciServerDetails serverDetails, Set<? extends ActionParameter<?>> parameters)
      Execute an ACI action on the specific ACI server.
